about_the_game:
In Splendor: The Cities, set off to discover the greatest cities in Europe – Lyon, Florence or Seville.
There is now a major difference in the aim of the game, as "noble" tiles have been replaced by "city" tiles. When a player meets the required conditions, they pick up a "city" tile. Their opponents must then do all they can to get their hands on the remaining cities before the end of the round, which signals the end of the game.
Become the only one to conquer a city or take over a city of greater value than your opponent's to win the game!
Features:
- Discover or rediscover the first content from the Cities of Splendor expansions
- Come up with brand new strategies to adapt to the new objectives
- Discover the new illustrations on the 7 tiles that are exclusive to this expansion
